summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Essays/Notes page functionality. All requirements met successfully - page loads at /essays with 'Notes' title, shows fragments only, includes access limitation messaging, and has no prohibited elements.
passed_tests: Each note shows only fragment (2-3 sentences)
Access notice at bottom: 'Full access to these notes is intentionally limited.'
Individual note page shows only first 2 paragraphs
Access limitation message appears after 2 paragraphs
Exact text present: 'Full access to these notes is intentionally limited.'
Request Context link present and functional
Navigation works correctly (back link returns to Notes)
Backend APIs all functioning correctly (6/6 tests passed)
Individual note navigation and back navigation working
success_percentage: frontend: 100% (17/17 requirements met), backend: 100% (6/6 API tests passed)
